metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5032 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI before 0.84.7 does not properly restrict access to cost information, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the cost criteria in the search bar.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
